transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir. Good evening sir.
Customer: Very good evening. Kya hua bhaiya kuch bhi humko difference nahi dikh raha hai. Kya ho gaya bhaiya?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Haan main kya bolta hu humko kuch bhi difference nahi dikh raha hai. Inquiry vagaira ka flow vagaira kuch bhi bada nahi hai. Jaisa ki vaisa hi hai.
Executive: Sir to isme matlab ki abhi to aapki process hi start nahi hui hai na sir next service ki.
Customer: Bhaiya uska hum baat hi nahi kar rahe. Jis din hum payment kar raha tha usi din bol raha tha humne ye isse to kafi guna behtar kon logo ko inquiry ja raha hai jo log MDC wale nahi rehte MDC. Haan. Haan aaj ka tarikh mein jo inquiry aaya hai aa raha hai isse nahi humko free listing mein jyada aata tha. Daily ka char panch inquiry at least aa jata tha. Aaj ka tarikh mein hum TrustSeal mein chal raha hai wo bhi humko. Sir sir aap sir suniye meri baat. Haan theek hai aapne panch saal pehle ki baat kar rahe ho na sir. Panch saal pehle ki competition aur abhi ki online competition dono mein differences hai.
Customer: Bhaiya raat aur din ko differences hai lekin pehle jo seller kam tha buyer jyada tha. Aaj ka tarikh mein seller jis tarah bada hai buyer bhi aaj ka tarikh mein log online ki taraf jagruk jyada hai na. Wo bhi aapke paas calls to ja rahi hai sir inquiry bhi ja rahi hai. Kahan ja rahi hai aap dikhao to sahi hume.
Executive: Aap fix kijiye abhi some time pehle aapke brother se bhi baat hua hai sir. Chalu rakhiye abhi aaj tak aaj tak kitna mila humko total inquiry aur call wo humko check karke bataiye aap.
Customer: Unko bhi maine sari cheeze bataya.
Executive: Sir bhaiya aap hume ek baar dobara bata dijiye.
Executive: Ek second sir main bata raha hu aapko.
Customer: Aaj ka din mein total din aur raat mila ke kitna aaya hai total bataiye.
Executive: Sir ye weekly ki main data bata raha hu sir aapko weekly ki main data bata raha hu. Nahi nahi aaj ka bhaiya aaj ka data bata dijiye na please. Sara din se inquiry kitna aaya call kitna aaya bataiye.
Customer: Sir update hone mein time lagti hai sir update hone mein na system mein. Bhaiya humko bhaiya aap naya wale ki baat kyu karte hai naya wale ka hum bola ki unko 15 din baad se humko karaiye hume koi dikkat nahi hai lekin filhal humre hath mein zeher khane ka paisa nahi hai idhar. To bhaiya humko inquiry vagaira chahiye na hamara pura. Pehle aapko hai na sir bataiye Nitish bhaiya Nitish bhaiya Nitish bhaiya. Haan. Aapne hume kya bola tha jab tak hum us wala services mein nahi chalega tab tak hamara MDC wala chalu rahega. Sahi hai ki nahi? Haan TrustSeal chalu hai TrustSeal chalu hai haan bataiye. To TrustSeal mein ye milta hai hume. TrustSeal jo aapki service already chal rahi hai wahi chal rahi hai na sir. To usme humko kya milta hai milta hai kya hume daily ka kam se kam 10 12 inquiry plus call vagaira milta hai lekin aaj ka tarikh mein daily ka ek inquiry mil raha hai aur ek call aa raha hai. Aapke paas call bhi aayi hai aap kitna aaya aapke paas call bhi aayi. Teen din mein kitna aaya bataiye. Teen din mein November mahine abhi November December November mein kitna aaya bataiye ek baar maaf kar dijiye humko bata dijiye. Ek second main bata raha hu. Inquiry abhi ye teen din mein aapke paas char din mein aapke paas jo aayi hai 15 inquiry aayi hai sir. To 15 divided four mariye. Haan four inquiry per day maan ke chaliye. Calls bhi aayi hai. Calls aur inquiry mila kar ke aapke paas ek second calls aur inquiry mila kar ke aapke paas five aur 15 20 panch aa rahi hai sir aapke paas calls inquiry mila kar ke. Ye ye kuch ye kuch baat hua bhaiya. Sir to increase jaise ki kuch product aapke deactivate the theek hai. Bhaiya aap wahi purane mudde pe chala gaya bhaiya aap BJP ki taraf purane mudde pe chala gaya. Naya baat karo na bhaiya humko differences kyu nahi dikh raha hai ab batane laga hai ki pehle to aaj se pehle do mahina pehle bhi hamara deactivate tha tab bhi badhiya chal raha tha. Do mahina pehle bhi main hi dekh raha tha sir. Haan bhaiya tab galat tha kya bataiye do mahina pehle hamara galat chal raha tha kya bataiye aap. Sir ye sir ye business hai up down hoti hai sir aapki offline bhi business hai up down hoti hai jahan tak main dekh pa raha hu pure 31 din mein aap aapne 171 71 by lead consume kiye hai sir jo ki pure one year mein pure one year mein itni by lead kabhi consume nahi kiye the sir jitni aapne October month mein kiye hai. Five din mein 38 by lead consume kiye sir to sir bhi aap thoda check dijiye humko sir. Kya? Sir bhi aap thoda mera profile abhi office band hone se pehle thoda ek baar profile check karke jaiye bhaiya haan. Profile check karke sir main samjha nahi. Mera catalog jo hai wo ek baar check karke jaiye. Theek. Profile okay okay catalog vagaira check kar lenge na. Theek theek hai theek hai. Okay bhaiya. Okay okay okay. Okay okay nahi theek hai good night.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not seeing any difference in inquiries.

- Free listing was better than TrustSeal.

- Wants to know total inquiries and calls for the day.



Resolution:

- Executive stated process not started for next service.

- Explained differences between past and present online competition.

- Provided data of 15 inquiries in last four days.

- Executive agreed to check the customer's catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check customer's catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, mdc, inquiry, catalog
